§ Berachain Validator Node

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

A **berachain validator node** helps append new blocks to the [[berachain]] blockchain-chain.

A **berachain validator node** is involved with the [[proof-of-liquidity]] [[consensus-algorithm]].

As of [[berachain]] v2, a **berachain validator node** needs to stake 69,420 [[bera]].
